name: Data Usage Monitor
tagline: Contribute to Research while sitting at home!
body:
# [Download the App](https://github.com/data-iiitb/data-iiitb.github.io/blob/master/Data.Usage.Monitor.apk?raw=true)

### Mission
We want to collect, curate & open source the data which is presently only available to big companies. This data can be used for fueling research, however the companies sell the data, becoming a roadblock for research. To catalyze the process we’ve crafted an android application that records the data used by a person on wifi & cellular network. This data is pushed on the server where it is collected & open sourced for further analytics.

### Roadmap
1. Improve Android App: Get Geolocation
2. Improve visualization

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with the App or have a suggestion to make project better? Please report it [here](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll work on it as soon as possible.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
